segments.text: Hi , Navy . Come in please . I'm just putting away on my books .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , you are leaving , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I'm going to take a holiday tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How nice ! I can see you are busying packing . I'm sorry to interrupt you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right . I'm almost finished . Do you need my help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , could you please go over this for me ? and see if there is any mistake in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right I'll read it soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me for taking your time .
segments.speaker: S1
